---
order: 0
title: Digital Garden
path: /themes/digital-garden
image: /img/hw.png
description: Gatsby Theme Digital Garden
---

An extension of [johno/digital-garden](https://github.com/johno/digital-garden) that adds the following:

- Styling
- Customizable navbar menu
- SEO support for title and meta tags
- Gatsby Image support
- Full featured, filterable portfolio
- Site wide search

## Getting Started

- Try out the [Demo](http://digitalgarden.westegg.xyz)
- Copy the starter from the [Westegg repo](http://repo.westegg.xyz/tree/master/starters/westegg-digital-garden)
- `$ npm install`
- `$ npm run build`
